title: 修为果的血量怎么删除
author: 月中行
txt_content: 如题，求解决，我删了修为果的插件，血量还在。

replies.author: Koke_Cacao
replies.txt_content:
装上这个插件
http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/maximum-health/

给所有玩家权限
maxhealth.20复制代码

replies.author: Koke_Cacao
replies.txt_content: 如果要用删文件的话会跟着清空玩家金钱或背包...

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... B62%5D%5Btype%5D%3D
此插件可以设置

replies.author: Innovators
replies.txt_content: 可以把玩家的数据删掉
